scripts.start: LAYOUT=layout.njk npm run watch:eleventy & npm run watch:sass && npm run watch:esbuild
scripts.start:slides: LAYOUT=slide.njk npm run watch:eleventy & npm run watch:sass && npm run watch:esbuild
scripts.build: npx sass sass:_site/css && npx esbuild js/app.js --outfile=js/script.js --bundle --minify && LAYOUT=layout.njk npx @11ty/eleventy && LAYOUT=slide.njk npx @11ty/eleventy && npx postcss _site/css/*.css -r -m --verbose
